casebody.data:
Derrick Anthony POLLY, petitioner,
v.
TEXAS. No. 13-9695. Supreme Court of the United States June 23, 2014.

Case below, 2010 WL 1254843.

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and petition for writ of certiorari to the Court of Criminal *2844Appeals of Texas dismissed. See Rule 39.8.
